title: These Are the 20 Must-Have Sneakers to Add to Your Cold-Weather Closet
description: And yes, some of these you can wear in other seasons, too.
excerpt: Want to skip the cold-weather boots from time to time? Slip on the best winter sneakers for women on your way out the door. Undeniably chic, you'll love these.

html:
Step into shearling

Voile Blanche Julia Pump Shearling Trainers

These are a warm hug for your feet. Lined with natural shearling, these will give all the warmth and comfort of your favorite slippers with the sporty trainer look.

Colors: Tobacco Ice

Sizes: US 5-12

Material: Leather, suede, rubber

Take a Hike

Merrell Moab Speed 2 Sneakers

Whether you’re an avid hiker or simply seeking extra grip for your daily walks, Merrell offers exceptional traction and stability with a rugged, durable design. The breathable textile upper provides comfort without sacrificing protection, making it an ideal choice for winter adventures.

Colors: 6 options

Sizes: US 6-11

Material: Nylon, TPU, recycled materials, rubber

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Pop of red

Rag & Bone Retro Runner Slim Sneakers

Add a pop of red to every look with this Rag & Bone pair, designed for the girl on the go. As comfortable as they are bold, their retro-inspired silhouette adds style that suits any occasion.

Colors: Lava Red

Sizes: EU 36.5-41

Material: Nylon, suede, leather

The Bold choice

Flower Mountain Barbour x Yamano 3 Sneakers

Step into a new pair of sneakers that are as bold as you are.

Colors: Pink, Khaki

Sizes: EU 37-45

Material: Suede, nylon, rubber

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Chic suede

Dries Van Noten Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers

A suede sneaker is the ultimate secret to elevating your winter wardrobe. Versatile enough to be dressed up or down, silhouettes like this are sure to bring warmth and style to the chilliest winter days. Just be sure to give them a spritz of shoe protector spray before you take them out!

Colors: Green, Silver, Dark brown

Sizes: IT 35-41

Material: Leather

Winter floral

Asics Cecilie Bahnsen x Gel-Terrain

The Asics Gel silhouette, reimagined by Cecilie Bahnsen, is the sporty trail shoe we didn’t know we needed—until now. With pull-tie laces for easy on-and-off, this pair ensures you stay quick on your feet, no matter where your next adventure takes you.

Colors: Sepia, Black, Red

Sizes: US 5-15.5

Material: Polyester, rubber

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Holiday season

Gola Torpedo Glimmer Sneakers

Go for the gold this holiday season with a pair of sneakers that perfectly match your festive vibe.

Colors: Gold/Evergreen, Gold/Cerose

Sizes: US 6-11

Material: Leather, suede, rubber

Patent pick

Stella McCartney S-Wave Sport Sneaker

Treat yourself to a new pair of sneakers in the must-have color of the season: burgundy.

Colors: Moka

Sizes: EU 36-41

Material: Faux leather, canvas, rubber

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Luxury runner

The Row Owen Runner

The return of cold weather doesn’t mean sacrificing style—just the opposite, actually! For those dry winter days, The Row’s Owen Runner is perfect. Its sleek design in the deep chocolate color with leather detailing is the definition of quiet luxury, and without a doubt, will be your go-to closet staple.

Colors: Brown, Black, Milk

Sizes: EU 35-42

Material: Polyester, leather

A throwback style in brushed suede and the perfect transitional color? Sign me up.

Colors: Vintage Green, Summit White, Muslin

Sizes: US 5-11.5

Material: Suede

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

In love with leopard

Alohas tb.490 Rife Soft Tan

Good news, ladies—leopard print is here to stay. Add the season’s hottest print to your footwear.

Colors: 31 options

Sizes: EU 35-46

Material: Leather, rubber, cotton

While chunky soles are perfect for winter, it’s important not to forget about our favorite flat styles. The seasonal color combination on these Pumas offers a refreshing touch, making them ideal for adding a subtle touch of color to your looks.

Colors: Frosted Dew/Gum

Sizes: US 5.5-11

Material: Leather, polyester, rubber

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Vintage green

Adidas Samba OG

The Adidas Samba reigns on, now in a festive evergreen hue with bold contrast stitching.

Colors: Crystal Sand/Mineral Green

Sizes: US 5-11

Material: Leather, rubber

Distressed leather

Isabel Marant Beth Sneakers

If you haven’t added a brown leather sneaker to your footwear rotation yet, it’s not too late! Plus, the shearling lining will keep your toes warm and cozy.

Colors: Vintage Brown

Sizes: Eu 36-41

Material: Calfskin, rubber

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

All year long

New Balance 9060

Adding another pair of New Balance sneakers to your collection is a must—especially with this futuristic design in the perfect fall and winter shade. Combining style with function, this pair features comfort technology in the midsole and heel for extra cushioning and stability.

Colors: 6 options

Sizes: US 5.5-14.5

Material: Mesh, suede, polyester

Sneaker boot

Moon Boot Park Soft Suede Slip On

If all my sneakers looked like this pair, I’d never wear anything else.

Colors: Cognac

Sizes: US 4.5-14

Material: Cow suede, polyamide

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Must have metallic

Adidas x Wales Bonner Samba

Here is yet another pair of Adidas to add to your wishlist—and, hopefully, your cart! A new round of Wales Bonner collaboration means funky textiles, playful color combos, and the ever-popular gum sole.

Colors: Silver & Brown

Sizes: US 5.5-12

Material: Leather, rubber

Cow print craze

Saucony x Nordstrom Triumph 22 Brindle

Calf hair is all the rage right now, making it the perfect texture to elevate your winter footwear. This Saucony x Nordstrom collaboration features a trendy cow-print upper on a sporty silhouette, creating a comfortable yet stylish sneaker for any season.

Colors: Chocolate/White

Sizes: US 5-12

Material: Brindle hairs, suede, PWRRUN PB foam

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Weather ready

On Cloudwander Waterproof

A pair of sneakers made for adventure. This lightweight, waterproof style features a cushioned foam rubber midsole and a treaded rubber sole, ensuring you’re ready for any type of weather.

Colors: Sand, Black, Hunter

Sizes: US 5-11

Material: Polyamide, recycled polyester

Sporty Mary Jane

MM6 Maison Margiela x Salomon XT Mary Jane Sneakers

Inspired by your favorite Mary Jane shoes, this MM6 x Salomon pair adds the perfect twist to your sporty chic look.

Colors: Black Soft Clay, Ginger Green Multi

Sizes: US 5-9

Material: Polyester, rubber
